headline: Allegion Unveils Self-Adjusting Enhancement to its LCN Senior Swing Series of Auto Operators
summary: Allegion US, a leading provider of security solutions, technology and services, is excited to announce the release of a series of enhancements to their LCN 2800IQ and 9500IQ Senior Swing series operators, including the patent-pending, self-adjusting technology, AdaptivIQ™.
